item.title: Antenatal Corticosteroids Safe for Child Development
item.description: A systematic review of 14 studies finds most neurodevelopmental outcomes show no association with antenatal corticosteroids. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Global Warming May Fuel Obstructive Sleep Apnea
item.description: Rising temperatures in recent years were associated with increased incidence of OSA worldwide. Medscape Medical News

item.title: SGLT2 Inhibitors Linked to Lower Risk for AF in T2D
item.description: A new study finds a link between the use of antidiabetic drugs like SGLT2 inhibitors and a reduced risk for atrial fibrillation in patients with type ...

item.title: Probiotics, Prebiotics Tied to Decreased Depression, Anxiety
item.description: The use vs nonuse of probiotics and prebiotics, alone or combined, are linked to a greater decrease in depression and anxiety symptoms, new research s...

item.title: Study Flags Risk Factors for Near-Fatal Anaphylaxis
item.description: A French study finds that an asthma diagnosis and peanut allergy are associated with severe food-induced anaphylaxis. Medscape Medical News
